content: Write code. Html should be without html, body, head and script tag. Wrap html code with ---starthtml--- ---endhtml---, css code with ---startcss--- ---endcss--- and javascript code ---startjs--- ---endjs---. And ---startcss--- ---endcss--- and javascript code ---startjs--- ---endjs--- will not be between  ---starthtml--- ---endhtml---
build a landing page for a house rental company
